io.github.yggdrasil80.yggtools.receiver.basic

Class BasicReceiverManager<RawData,Data,Rcv extends BasicReceiver<RawData,? extends Data>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.yggdrasil80.yggtools.receiver.basic.BasicReceiverManager<RawData,Data,Rcv>
  • Type Parameters:
    RawData - The raw data type of the event, usually a String or a Byte[].
    Data - The data type of the event, converted, usually with Gson, from the raw data.
    Rcv - The type of the receiver, extending from BasicReceiver

    public abstract class BasicReceiverManager<RawData,Data,Rcv extends BasicReceiver<RawData,? extends Data>>
extends java.lang.Object
    The receiver manager is responsible for managing the receivers.
